description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Die Märztage des Jahres 1798. Kriegsgeschichtliche Darstellung der Ereignisse im Kampfe Berns mit den französischen Armeen. Mit zwei geographischen Übersichtskarten ... Illustreirt von Hans Beat Wieland ... Herausgegeben von Dr. Hans Balmer" Author: BADERTSCHER, Gustav Adolf. Contributor: Balmer, Hans. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9304.g.16." Page: 149 Place of Publishing: Bern Date of Publishing: 1898 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000166111 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
